title: Agrim - Business Analyst - SQL/Python
description:
Our Vision

In India, there are 140M+ farmers who are served by 1M+ agri-input retailers for all their agri-input needs.

These retailers are the backbone of the overall value chain and primarily rely on :


Deep understanding of local consumption patterns
Strong relationships with farmers
Offering of short-term credit
Overall cost-effectiveness


However, there are key challenges for retailers that limit their business growth :


Limited product selection via traditional distributors
Inefficient sourcing
Working capital pressure


We, at Agrim, are re-imagining this $50bn market. We want to transform the traditional supply chain and infuse it with technology, modern retail best practices & data science for credit underwriting.

Roles And Responsibilities


Solve Challenging and Muddy problems leveraging the Fundamentals of Analytics and Business Intelligence.
You need to have hunger to bring change in the organisation leveraging the power of Data
Experience building and designing complex dashboards
Develop Reports for Business to influence Key Business KPIs
Work with Business Stakeholders and Design the Solutions


Requirements


Strong analytical and quantitative skills with the ability to use data and metrics to justify requirements
1-2 years of experience working as a Business Analyst or a similar role involving data extraction, analysis, and Problem Solving
Proficiency in Building Dashboards enabling Business Impact
You never hesitate to roll up your sleeves and tackle something hands-on, you persevere when others fall away
A keen learner and willing to adapt to new environments
Can lead, work independently as well as play a key role in a team
Hands-on experience with Expert Level SQL and Python
Understanding of Production Level Coding
